title: Why I got furious when NB said "I hate Lol, the company, and the community."
body:
No, this is not an opinion. I'm going full hammer on this bitch.

NB to start off, stop acting like a brad who deserves better. You don't. You incompetent and ungrateful for their hard work, you do not understand what they do, you do not work hours upon hours to fix every little mistake in the game and keep in touch with the community. If you do not like the game, just say that and move onto play other games.
Your statement makes you sound like a clown. You're not fixing a problem by saying, "I hate the game and everyone who plays it.". Give us points, reasons, and facts, to take you seriously. The only thing you gave us was you drinking from your damn water bottle. Oh yeah, NB you so right, I should, totally, hate Riot and the community as well because I can completely understand what you hate, about Riot and the community. 
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
There is a lot wrong with League of Legends, and its community. BUT SO IS IT FOR ANY FUCKING GAME. But you're taking out of context all the good shit they have done. I have many friends who played from season 1 till now, and they said the same thing. The game has gotten better, but they should focus on the fun aspect of the game a little more often. Understandable and I'm pretty sure, Riot is seeing peoples wishes and is on their workbench to figure something out.
But they can't develop if you do not come with reasons and helpful criticism. How do you expect them to fix it if you don't give them something to fix?
All in all, you should not be taken seriously. You can stop playing the game, and you have full right to do so. But don't go out your way to try to smear a company who is trying their best.
Riot is not EA, Ubisoft, Blizard, or any other company other than Riot games. Their game is free to play and there are no monthly subscriptions, like, World of WarCraft. Total rip off your money if you ask me. Riot is not like steam trying to make you pay 5 dollars to get access to all there features. Riot is not like Ubisoft, PlayStation, and X-box who wants you to pay a monthly fee for their subscription, to get access to multiplayer. Riot is the most honest, free, and understanding company, out of all of the others I have listed.
I do not know where NB is getting this attitude from but it needs to stop.
Don't get me wrong NB, your probably a nice guy. But you need to shut the fuck up about shit you know little to no shit about. 

Anyway, thanks for your time and eyes, I hope, this didn't tricker too many NB fans. But he went to far and had no good reason.

Hope you all have a fantastic day. Peace.

Steam is the only company demanding 5$ to get access to all the features. Riot doesn't. 
PlayStation, X-Box, and Ubisoft are the companies demanding you to pay a subscription to access Multiplayer. Riot doesn't.
World of Warcraft demands you to pay every month to play their game. Riot doesn't.

Riot doesn't even demand anything. They don't force you to buy their skins. They don't force you to buy their merchandise. They don't force you to pay 5$ or a monthly fee to play their game. They want you to play their game and enjoy playing it, and if we don't. They give us new stuff; champions, skins, reworks, game updates, and etc. 

NB is hating on a company that is trying and isn't pushing their community aside. Can you now see why he is the asshole?

Your post sounded very unreasonable and irrational in the way it was conveyed. However, I got the point clear by doing some digging. I would say to phrase it better and provide evidence.

I also believe this is player-shaming.

I never intended to sound rude. I'm sorry.

What NB3 said was not fair, for the company and (or) community. He sounded like a kid who didn't get what he wanted. A spoiled brat.
You can't go out and say, "I hate all of you." without a reason to hate them. To honest, I don't even think Riot gives a flying fuck about him, nor do I think they should. When I think something is wrong with League, I try to back up my statement or opinion up. I put a reason for my disgust, and I don't, just, hate.
NB3 attacked us as a community, even if we are good or bad. And he should get some backlash for his stupidity, and his unnecessary rude behavior for nothing we as a community did to him. (Yes, Riot is technically a part of the community.)

Out of most MOBA games, Riot is probably the most honest, free, and understanding company. Free keys and chest, just for playing the game. They demand no fees or monthly payment, to play the game, or getting access to all the benefits. They try there best to stay in touch with the community, by posting and commenting. And they usually keep their promises. 
I think NB3's statement about the game went too far, was unreasonable, and made himself sound like a brad who deserves better. There is no reason to hate the whole company. Riot is not perfect NB3. You can hate the game, but you can't hate a company that tries, and a community that has both good and bad people. That's just not how it works.

It sounds like NB is burned out on league. Which happens. You do something for long enough, you get burned out on it. He's also probably frustrated since most of the people that watch his channel only watch it because he plays league.
